fields.title: 1990 census of population and housing. Public use microdata samples. B (1%) sample

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue:
2 computer laser optical discs ; 4 3/4 in.

Contains housing unit and person records drawn from the full census sample. Contains records for 5 percent of the population; each housing unit and person record contains a weight field (HOUSWGT or PWGT1) which has a value that represents the record's relationship to the entire population.

Disc 1: Alabama - Montana

Disc 2: Nebraska - Wyoming

Public use microdata samples.;
